trns: occurs before sibilants [s, z] (the [s] plus consonant)
occurs colloquially before [v, γ, δ, f, x, θ, ks, ps]
δ - συν- (“together”) + δέντρο (“tree”) → σύδεντρο (“group of trees”) /ˈsiðendro/
φ - συν- (“co-”) + φέρω (φέρον) (“bear, bring”) → συμφέρον (“the interest”) /simˈferon/  > colloquial συφέρο /siˈfero/
